pull.title: depends: Use more legible qmake commands in qt package
pull.body:
Rather than using `cd` to jump all over the place, perform all `(q)make` commands from the top level directory.

Looking at bash like `cd ../../../..` gives me a headache.

Credits to **fanquake**.

This PR is an alternative to #20504 that works without any additional [non-trivial hack](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20504#issuecomment-734730336).

verification.payload:
tree f3ec4266e4a0881a3109283859fdd43aa86a9f7a
parent 6af8a6232b2d5fd1874d215f67749a2a6b498bea
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1608118512 +0200
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1608124884 +0200

depends: Do not set build_subdir for qt package

This change makes the next commit possible without exporting the PATH
variable.

events.message:
depends: Do not set build_subdir for qt package

This change makes the next commit possible without exporting the PATH
variable.

verification.payload:
tree 49477fc8672cc30e7deb9df32c2bb3bb9651cdd1
parent bf35a8da6ec2791dedf36f459add69ac67b11ff9
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1608122471 +0200
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1608124891 +0200

depends: Use more legible qmake commands in qt package

This change gets rid of multiple `../` that makes reasoning about the
script and its maintaining much easier.

Co-authored-by: fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com>

events.message:
depends: Use more legible qmake commands in qt package

This change gets rid of multiple `../` that makes reasoning about the
script and its maintaining much easier.

Co-authored-by: fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com>

events.body: Concept ACK: more readable and thus easier to reason about :)

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #20642 (depends: Drop unneeded patches for qt package by hebasto)
* #20641 (depends: Use Qt top-level build facilities by hebasto)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Tested ACK 87fe104537eab5ccd8728321fe1c9ba39f7dda78.

This is a nice change that makes it more readable.
